title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus. It only takes focus when the combo list is dropped down.
EB: When clicking on the first Combo, it should take focus regardless of whether the combo list is dropped down or not.
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Locate the first Combo
3. Click on the first Combo
4. Observe if it takes focus
5. Drop down the combo list
6. Observe if it takes focus
